Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Dubois Gauthier Dupont's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Dubois Gauthier Dupont is a 56 year old Partner from France. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Dubois Gauthier Dupont has been happily married to Margaux since 1996. Dubois and Margaux have 2 children, named Clémentine and Richard.
Education Background:
Dubois obtained his secondary school diploma from Lycée Chaptal in 1987.
Dubois graduated from Sorbonne University in 1992, completing his higher education.
Dubois earned his additionally degree from American Graduate School of Business in Paris in 1997.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 33 years, Dubois Gauthier Dupont has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1992, Dubois Gauthier Dupont started working as a Analyst at  Eurazeo SE, marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Apax Partners SAS as a Associate, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1998 to 2002.
From 2004 to 2006, he served as a Investment Director at BC Partners, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He appointment as a Partner at Apax Partners SAS in 2007 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 810000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Lille, Lyon and Rennes, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited 590000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2013, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
